attributes.action: Parliament must decide Norway etc. style deal, no deal or revoke article 50
attributes.background: Parliament must debate and decide on one of these options and end debate about the British electorates future and tell us the voters so we may plan and protect ourselves accordingly since they will not. Remain or Exit no longer matters. We are the people and mp's are supposed to represent us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure what you mean by 'Norway etc. style deal' or what you would want to happen if there was a 'no deal' vote. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
